item.title: NVDA
item.description: score:91 Chances: NVIDIA’s stock has shown remarkable growth, with shares up roughly 180% year to date and the company reaching $1 trillion in market capitalization. Advancements in artificial intelligence have contributed to NVIDIA’s excitement and growth, positioning the company at the heart of the AI frenzy.
